Once there, a cab was already waiting to take you to the exact hotel where you'd find Lohan. All according to plan. Upon arrival, you walked inside, lookign at your map. According to this she was on the third floor, room 406. Interesting. After a few more minutes you and your team were there, in front of the door.
122.title: Lindsay Lohan

choices: Lindsay is laying down on a bed at the far end.
A few of the men from your team start coming under the door.
1221.content:
Your smile only gets wider as you think more and more on the subject. Deep in thought about how amazing this opportunity truly was, however, you weren't actually accomplishing anything. Just as you were hesitating on when to swallow your SRT and begin the journey, you notice that the rest of you team hadn't made it yet. Perfect, the less competition the better, even if this was supposed to be a group effort. You knew enough about the paparazzi to know that teamwork was all fine and good, but when it came down to the dirtiest, most enticing secrets of a celebrity's life it became survival of the fittest. And you, as of now, were by far the fittest candidate. Taking a deep breath, you pop the pill-shaped tablet into your mouth and swallow hard.

The last few seconds were a blur. The sensation of your diminishment felt like you were somewhere between melting and freezing, all repeating several times before you finally lay flat on your back, jaw dropped. You leap to your feet, feeling a little woozy. Glancing at your legs, arms, and torso you can't believe it actually worked. True, you had never actually doubted that the SRT would do it's job, but seeing was believing in this case. By your own judging, it would appear that you were about a half-inch tall, slightly different than your expected outcome. But wouldn't smaller be better when the objective was to stay unseen?

Wasting no time, you rush underneath the door frame as you hear the booming footsteps of what you can only assume is the rest of your team with all of the filming equipment. They must have been quite stealthy to anyone else, but your magnified sense of hearing (to be more truthful it was just that you were so small and now were picking up the much larger waves) alluded to the opposite. Just as you pass below the doorframe which was at least two inches high, a whole new vista of enlarged objects met your view. The hotel room was simply massive in your eyes, and you look around quickly, neck craning.
1221.title: Take It Now

choices: You climb the bed for a better look
12212.content:
You pass by a pair of massive high heels and some random clothes. Not very dignified, but you have bigger fish to fry. You thought you saw something move on the bed. So, hoping to beat the others, you head over for a closer look. When you reach one side of the bed beside a used wine glass, you see a massive arm draping over from beneath the covers. You look up and see Lindsay Lohan, fast asleep. Her right arm dangles above you, with her face partially veiled behind the pillow and her hair. You take a few snaps of the wine glass and the clothing on the floor, but you know that in some time the others will catch up to you.

Eventually...
12212.title: Sleeping

choices: Left, toward the bottom of Lindsay.
Right, toward the top and her face.
122121.content:
Tired of waiting on the floor for your obnoxiously late coworkers, you sit down and think. The real reason for this whole operation had been to get soem good shots of Lindsay, the stuff around her, and all of that potentially juicy information that must dripping from this place. However, there was no way you would be able to get any of that from on the floor, and to be honest you felt a little vulnerable down so low at your new size. So, looking around, you see all of the stuff you normally would in a hotel, only beefed up an much more fancy, since it was easily the nicest one you'd ever seen. That was one of the fundamental problems with celebrities, you thought; they had so much money coming out of their ears that they spent it on useless trappings. It might be an unfair stereotype, but it was your job to judge the people that society was attracted to.

After a bit, you decided that you should do less thinking and just get to higher ground ebfore your team showed up and ruined everything. Walking over to the bed, you notice that there were three routes that could lead you to the top. One was quite risky, and you could almost rule it out now: climbing Lindsay's arm which was dangling almost to the floor. But then you realize that it's still to high, so there are only two. The bedpost, which had grooves cut into it for ornamental value, which were on other side of you. As you had briefly witnessed before the titanic young woman had been laying with her head to your right, only several feet above you, with her feet laying on your left. So one bedpost would lead you to her feet and the other to her face. The face would have more coverage value, but starting by the feet would let you get a body shot which you also no will have value.
122121.title: The Bed

choices: You want to get some shots from right here.
You want to climb Lindsay for better pictures.
1221211.content:
You really have no personal preference, since both ways seems like they'd accomplish the same exact task. But you had always been a fan of left, and were left-handed, so why not? Facing in the aforementioned direction you rub your hands together and then, realizing they are soaked with sweat from your anxiety, wipe them off on your shirt. Kind of unsanitary but that wasn't big on your mind right now. Now you're ready to climb the vertical bedpost and get to your first targeted celebrity as an inch tall man. Bullshit. The experience is losing its effect, but you still had a job to do.

You test the wood with one hand while testing the lowerparts with your legs. Both seems sturdy enough to support your near incomprehensibly light weight, so you don't deliberate ay further and begin. After repeating the same boring steps that aren't worthy of any detail, you are already midway on the bedpost. Fearing an ambush of vertigo, you don't look down. If TV had taught you anything, that was it. Bringing your arm up again,you start to feel tired, three-quarters from ground zero, which was the carpeted floor of Lohan's room. You must be out of shape or something. However, there was the possibility that the SRT took a toll on one's muscles, but you had only heard that in a theory.

But you push on through your tiring and reach that elusive summit, feeling a lot better than you had before. Finally,the very first step of your mission was done,and with few complications. If only your absent team could see you now. Speaking of them,you use your now advanced vantage point to scan the horizon for them. To your disdain they really are there, just passing under the doorframe as you watched. Four men. Hadn't there been five people who went along though? Oh yeah, another chick. She must've bailed at the last minute. Returning your gaze to the objective, you now find yourself standing by the feet of this giantess of a celebrity, and you ave to admit it's pretty humbling.
1221211.title: Left

12212111.content:
You decide you have a nice view of the giant celebrity. So you begin to set up your equipment. You do all this hastely before the others take their shots. As you place the tripod onto the bed surface, you realize that it is too soft to hold the legs upright. But it will have to do. You set up the camera, turn it on, and make your first shot.

Before you could make a second shot, the giantess before you moves and yawns. Suddenly, her massive foot resting on the bed plows towards you with no sign of stopping. She knocks over the camera, sending it falling to the carpet below. She stretches her toes and you find yourself between her second and big toe. Then they close together, leaving to trapped.

To make matters worse...
12212111.title: Just a few shots...

choices: Walk alongside Lindsay's body to get to her face for some pictures.
Scale Lindsay's foot and take the body route.
122121111.content:
To make matters worse the thrashing now stops, and Lindsay is back into her dormant state. Of all the bad luck! But then again, it might have been worse if the red-haired giantess were awake, for a number of reasons. First, maybe you would have been felt, if that happened your whole plot to get the best celebrity coverage would be finished, and no telling what she'll do to a tiny spy if she found one. A shiver runs up your spine, although you can hardly move between the two sealing toes. It smelled less rancid than you would have suspected, since Lohan was a pretty, clean girl on most accounts. But still, there was no disguising the faint, stale odor that sweaty feet produced.

You give one last effort to struggle against their immense weight, as if struggling would simply make them move by your own will. Miraculously they part from your minute strength, and you don't question your luck as you shove your way out of the toe trap. Unbelievale how it had come to this, just fifteen minutes after you had swallowed the SRT and shrunk, already you had almost been trapped and left to die inadverdantly by the very celebrity you were supposed to be getting dirt on! Pathetic, you were. Hopefully your comrades down on the floor were doing better than you had been. Lindsay's toes wiggled in slip, just overhead. Domineering, but at least she still had't found you.That was the critical point.

You discover that your handheld camera was more fortunate than your other equipment, so there's still an opportunity for redemeption. Amazing how the SRT shrk not only you but everything you were holding or touching at the time. You could see it being abused though,in the future, so it's good that it was kept a secret so far. But then, as a parazzo you knew that secrets could only be held for so long.
122121111.title: Lindsay's Toe Trap

choices: All goes well, and you reach her calf.
Lindsay shifts again, but what happened?
1221211112.content:
You rub your jaw, thinking of how you could do this right. It was lucky, to put it mildly, that you had escaped the toe trap earlier. Even after that, however, your resolve wasn't shaken. It had just been a minor setback, nothing more. So you still had the initiative to get some actual, legitimate dirt on Lindsay. Fate had given you another chance, hadn't it? This might not be the best time to choose to climb the length of Lindsay, but you're running out of options here.

Taking one last glimpse of the enormous foot that had just imprisoned you a minute ago, it was truly humbling. But then, were you any safer just standing there, gaping at it? Getting back down would be out of the question anyway, by your estimate. The huddled voices of your crew members down on the floor manage to reach your perceptive ears. This finally spurs you on to the climb. If this was what it took to survive in the shrinking business, you were all for it.

Taking a different angle than before, you reach a spot where it would be awkward for Lindsay's foot to move, so in a way it sheltered you from being trapped again. Taking hold of a fistful of her skin, you scamper back up the bare foot with the agility of a squirrel. Not bad, you surmise, after reaching the top of her sideways sole. You clamber to the edge, ready to take the sidled route across her sideways appendage. After all, there could be no going back now. You purse your lips and walk out...
1221211112.title: Take Two

12212111121.content: You are now on top of the mountain that is Lindsay's ankle. You look foward towards her face, but she is still asleep and it is obscured by her hair and her body. To your right, you can barely see the wine glass and scattered clothes from here. Behind you, the other paparazzi digs around the hotel for some dirt on Lindsay Lohan. You leave the random rubbish to them. You're on the body of your main target. Still from your position, getting a good shot is difficult. Who would even know that you photographed Lindsay Lohan anyways. In the hopes of getting a good shot of unaware sleeping Lindsay, you...
12212111121.title: All goes well

choices: ...Lindsay is still sleeping, just having a nightmare.
...the celebrity, looking down with disgust, raising her hand to swat you.
122121111211.content:
As much as you would like to play it safe, the brutal reality is that standing still is only going to increase your risk of falling off if Lindsay moves again. Not to mention that due to the angle you had presently you could never get a good snapshot off. Leave all of the small stuff (no pun intended) to your companions down at the floor of the room, after all what else were they good for? With your amrs sticking out straight on both sides, you manage to pull of the balancing act for a bit longer, and you reach what appears to be the side of ribcage. That was progress, believe it or not, because trying to safely cross a sideways person at your size was pretty difficult. But lucky you were, because she could have moved at any moment.

Okay, you could get some decent pictures now, if not better onces as you continued on. After about a solid minute of shutters flashes, you can tell that Lindsay had just become halfwake, and is moving again in her sleep. Bending your knees for balance and support, you slide the camera back into your pocket and just try to wait out the storm. But it gets a bit more ferocious, including flailing legs, tossing, and turning. Was she having a nightmare or is she freaking out because what she thinks is a bug had been crawling on her? There's no way to tell as you're sent hurtling to the side form the tumult, landing softly on the blanket beside her chest. Looking upward you see...
122121111211.title: Crossing The Uncharted Expanse Of Lindsay

choices: Climb up her breasts towards her face
1221211112111.content: The tremors ease as Lindsay falls back asleep again. Her breathing calms. She adjusts her arm as she sinks back into sleep. As for you, you quickly check your equipment, and most importantly, yourself. Fortunately none of your cameras are damaged and you are unharmed. But you invesitgate your situation. To your left, you are beside a cavernous tunnel made by her sheets separated from the mattress by her body. Above you is the sleeping celebrity's breasts and above that, her face. You could take decent pictures here, but it would be better to get closer. So you decide to...
1221211112111.title: Just some nightmare

125.content: Okay, how about a few others?
125.title: Alternate Options

125331.content: Do you want to go with this or would you like more options?
125331.title: Melissa Joan Hart....or?

1253312.content: Maybe you are placed in the home of Katy Perry?
1253312.title: more

12533122.content: Emma Watson, Miranda Cosgrove, Mila Kunis?
12533122.title: More

125332.content: Sorry to do this, but the interactive was roadblocked. So do you still wanna go with Jolie.
125332.title: Angelina Jolie

1253322.content: How about the very lovely, Lena Heady
1253322.title: other

info.brief_description: You are a group of paparazzi shrunk small enough to spy on celebrities
info.description:
Celebrities try everything to shrug off the pushy industry of paparazzi and tabloids. But now, this arms race has changed considerably. You and a small group of photographers/film recorders are shrunk down to miniscule sizes and released into celebrities' homes. What happens next is up to you.

Guidelines
Nobody in the story under 18
Male and female interaction is allowed
Your character should be either unnoticed or, if found, assumed to be a bug.
